name: A Few Maneuvers
Lore: '''...I know a few maneuvers. We''ll lose them.'' Boosted shields and fancy flying are necessary to escape Imperial weapon fire until hyperspace jump can be made.',
Text: 'Add 2 to hyperspeed and maneuver of any starfighter for the remainder of this turn. (Interrupt may even affect the result immediately after a destiny draw targeting the starfighter''s maneuver.)',
